New Records: Harry Kane will receive a golden cap in recognition of making his 100th appearance for the senior team
Pre-Game Insights: Harry Kane wants to play on well beyond his 100th England cap
Kane has made clear that he wants to play at the next World Cup and perhaps beyond
Post-Match Reflections: Interim England boss Lee Carsley showed signs of using Harry Kane more effectively in his first game in charge, Saturday's 2-0 win in the Republic of Ireland
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Football Association will pay tribute to Sven-Goran Eriksson following the death last month of the first man from outside Britain to manage the national team
Others: Harry Kane faces an uncertain future intertwined with that of interim manager Lee Carsley
Kane is only the 10th man to reach the milestone of 100 England caps
